attributes.action: Call a General Election in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: To call a motion of no confidence in our current government and require a general election to be held
attributes.background: Our prime minister was only elected by a small number of the Conservative Party and is currently running our country into the ground. We the people demand a democratic and fair election for a new government

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
